channel.title: Dragon Sq Colours
channel.description:
I'm trying to recolor a dragon sq, but the original colors aren't in iceman's item dump, i cant find any dragon sq recolors to pinch the colors form and i cant find any color of item dumps with the dragon sq colors in them on mopar, rune-server or any random forums.
So could someone please either tell me the original colors, give me a dragon sq recolor (wouldn't matter what it was colored to as long as it's a dragon square) or post a link to a color or item dump with the colors in it?

item.title: Dragon Sq Colours
item.dc:creator: @miyu_miyu5 miyu miyu5
item.description:
@miyu_miyu5 wrote:

use a model recoloer app usally in allstar scape source
